jira_key.description: Identifier of the project as used in the issue tracker.

jira_name.description: Name of the project as used in the issue tracker. May be the same as `jira_key`.

github_team.description: Name of the team in the GitHub source of the project.

gitlab_group_name.description: Name of the group in the GitLab source of the project.

tfs_collection.description: Name of the collection in the TFS source of the project.

quality_name.description: Name of the project used as an identifier at the quality metrics project definition source.

quality_display_name.description: Human-readable name of the project retrieved from the quality metrics project definition source.

main_project.description: Main project for this subproject, if the project has a known hierarchical relation with another, encompassing project.

is_support_team.description: Whether the project is maintained by a team as a means of support for other projects.
